channel.title: [614] Please Help Me Guys [614]
channel.description:
Guy's i've been trying for 3 day's straight to fix this, like i click run to run the server and after like 8 minutes - 10 minutes the server will what i call "null" you aren't able to open the shops, nor attack the players and it wont even show hp or hits when trying to attack a player.
http://prntscr.com/azdgi http://puu.sh/CXMg
[img]http://puu.sh/CXMg[/img] [img]http://prntscr.com/azdgi[/img]
Please guy's i beg you to please help! :( I've gone it to 26 players already but the null always makes them quit. :'( Please someone help me, i host this on a vps.
Add me on skype: I-Pk-Banks Or Msn: vortexscape@hotmail.com Or visit me on the chatbox at: xat.com/verprex & pm me on chatbox if you can help me or post under here.
Please guy's im seriously begging you, if there was a time i ever really needed help it's right now. I've checked the run.bat to see if it throws any nullpointerexception on there and it doesn't. Please guys seriously im really begging. :confused:

item.title: [614] Please Help Me Guys [614]
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

All Time Low:

I don’t think it has anything to do with that, recently my friend was hosting it and it wouldn’t null every 10 minutes, only like every 8 hours and he told me he made it null cause he fucked me over it’s a long story so yeah its not because of that. :s

Crap stability ithink. Afew ways to fix

  1. (easy) Buy a fucking awsome vps which costs like 100000$ that should keep the server running at an optimum level.
  2. find the fix (i cant say by looking)
  3. addmy msn il gladly help if i see problem quick
